clinical_study.brief_title: PD-1 Antibody Expressing CAR-T Cells for EGFR Family Member Positive Advanced Solid Tumor (Lung, Liver and Stomach)
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study of PD-1 Antibody Expressing CAR-T Cells for EGFR Family Member Positive Advanced Solid Tumor (Lung, Liver and Stomach)

brief_summary.textblock:
Objectives:
To evaluate the safety and effectiveness of cell therapy using herinCAR-PD1 cells to treat relapsed or refractory cancer.
Eligibility:
Individuals greater than or equal to 18 years of age and less than or equal to 70 years of age who have been diagnosed with relapsed or refractory cancer that has not responded to or has relapsed after standard treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: A total of 20 patients may be enrolled over a period of 1-2 years.

arm_group.description: Patients will receive 3 cycles of HerinCAR-PD1 cells treatment.

intervention.description: herinCAR-PD1 cells transfusion: (1-5×107/kg herinCAR-PD1 + physiological saline + 0.25% human alloalbumin) 300ml for each infusion. IV (in the vein) for each infusion, 2 cycles, each cycle received one infusions on day 21, 43.
